features: Easy access to food and countertop the roll top door moves up and out of the way so you can have safe, easy access to your food before, during and after cooking
Easy to keep clean door is up and out of the way of messy spills and drips

body.description: You won’t find a design like the Hamilton Beach easy reach toaster oven with roll-top door anywhere else. Its unique and large opening makes food easy to reach. And since the door opens above the oven, it frees up your countertop space in front. Best of all, it’s easy to keep clean because food can’t spill on the door. Contoured dials are easy to grip and turn, making it simple to switch between bake, broil and toast settings. The stay-on setting is safer thanks to a stop mechanism that prevents the knob from being turned to stay-on by accident. Care - This appliance is not intended for use by persons (including children) with reduced physical, sensory, or mental capabilities, or lack of experience and knowledge, unless they are closely supervised and instructed concerning use of the appliance by a person responsible for their safety. Close supervision is necessary when any appliance is used by or near children. Children should be supervised to ensure that they do not play with the appliance. Do not touch hot surfaces. Use handles or knobs. To protect against electric shock, do not immerse cord, plug, or toaster oven in water or other liquid. Unplug from outlet when not in use and before cleaning. Allow to cool before cleaning appliance and putting on or taking off parts. Do not operate any appliance with a damaged supply cord or plug, or after the appliance malfunctions or has been dropped or damaged in any manner. Supply cord replacement and repairs must be conducted by the manufacturer, its service agent, or similarly qualified persons in order to avoid a hazard. Call the provided customer service number for information on examination, repair, or adjustment. The use of accessory attachments not recommended by the appliance manufacturer may cause injuries. Do not use outdoors. Do not let cord hang over edge of table or counter or touch hot surfaces. Do not place on or near a hot gas or electric burner or in a heated oven. Extreme caution must be used when moving an appliance containing hot oil or other hot liquids. Use extreme caution when removing pan or disposing of hot grease. Do not clean with metal scouring pads. Pieces can break off the pad and touch electrical parts, creating a risk of electrical shock. Oversize foods or metal utensils must not be inserted in a toaster oven as they may create a fire or risk of electric shock.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hamilton Beach 6-Slice Countertop Convection Toaster Oven with Easy Reach Roll-Top Door Easy access to food and countertop... You won’t find a design like the Hamilton Beach Easy Reach Toaster Oven with Roll-Top Door anywhere else. Its unique and large opening makes food easy to reach. And since the door opens above the oven, it frees up your countertop space in front. Best of all, it’s easy to keep clean because food can’t spill on the door. Contoured dials are easy to grip and turn, making it simple to switch between bake, broil and toast settings. The stay-on setting is safer thanks to a stop mechanism that prevents the knob from being turned to stay-on by accident.

Features: Convection Unlike many other toaster ovens, this oven lets you choose between bake and convection. The bake function is great for making delicious cakes and desserts. Use convection for crisp, golden-brown pizza and for an evenly cooked, caramelized crust on baked goods. Convection provides more even cooking as the fan circulates heated air continuously around the food. Convection typically reduces cooking time by up to 25%. Fits a 9” x 11” Bake Pan, 12” Pizza, or 6 Slices of Toast With 4 settings and a spacious interior, the Hamilton Beach Easy Reach Toaster Oven can accommodate the foods your family makes most: after-school snacks, toast, frozen pizzas or homemade meals. Easy-to-Grip, Contoured Knobs This toaster oven is the first of its kind to have an innovative design that makes grasping and turning the control dials easy for anyone. The timer knob includes a stop mechanism that makes the stay-on setting even safer.

Easy Access to Food Sprinkle cheese on your pizza while it’s baking or safely grab toast in the very back without all the maneuvering. The roll-top door moves up and out of the way so you can have safe, easy access to your food before, during and after cooking. Easy Access to Countertop The Easy Reach Toaster Oven door rolls up, not down, making it easy to move food directly to your plate when it’s done. Easy to Keep Clean Melted cheeses, crumbs and juices are less likely to end up on the door because the door is never under the food rack, even when food is being removed or put into the oven. The crumb tray is removable for easy cleaning.

Hamilton Beach products are thoughtfully designed to make your life easier. We use consumer insights, in-depth research to deliver the best solution to your everyday needs. Whether it's preparing delicious meals and beverages effortlessly, or making your clothes look their best, you can count on the brand that has spent over 100 years creating products with you in mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Hamilton Beach toaster oven!
reviews.reviewText: I love this Hamilton Beach toaster oven! Looks great and works and toasts/cooks perfectly. I haven't used the "convection" setting yet but overall I am very impressed with this toaster oven. I do wish the power cord was little longer and I really don't understand, if I have turned everything off, why I should have to "unplug" the unit after each use. But it doesn't take up much counter space and I love the way the door "rolls up" and out of the way. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little oven!
reviews.reviewText: I love that the door swings up and over the oven - helps keep me from burning my hands, and helped us break the REALLY BAD habit of setting stuff on top! Heats up fast, and works well, so far. We've only had it for a couple months, now, so I've no idea how long it will operate well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little toaster oven
reviews.reviewText: I love this toaster oven. It works well and is well made. The big clean window is awesome for monitoring the cooking food. The window stays clean since it rolls up out of the way.Only downside is there are no handles. You have to let it cool down before you move it. I didn’t even think about that before I bought it.I also learned the hard way to remove a dish (left on top to warm) BEFORE opening the slide up door.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works as designed. Will accommodate a large pizza dish
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to replace an air fryer which didn’t work well. This does everything the air fryer was supposed to do, and with less noise, time, and fuss.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as it should. Priced good
reviews.reviewText: This thing works really good. Made great. Operates as it should. Really good door design. I think sized just right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The rolling door is perfect. The others I had were impossible to clean as crud woud always get in the seems. Anyway, this one stays clean and cooks great. The back does not get hot so it does not need extra space. Love it !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect OVEN (it's not just for toast)
reviews.reviewText: I've been using a small Rival toaster oven for years but have wanted to upgrade to something larger. I've had my eye on the Hamilton Beach EAsy Open oven for a while so when it went on sale during Prime Days I got it for half its original cost and took the plunge. I've been using this oven nearly daily for the last few months without complaint. It has exceeded my expectations completely and then some.I love the easy open door... I wasn't sure how much clearance I would have under my counter but it's just the right height so I can easily open and close the door.The control knobs are fantastic and easy to read... I didn't want digital controls (my husband is completely in the dark when it comes to tech stuff) and these are so easy to use... very intuitive, plug it in and it basically explains itself... didn't really even need the manual to figure out how it works.It cooks to accurate temperatures as well. Some reviews stated that the cook temps were off, but I have not found this to be the case and have used an oven thermometer to test the termperatures. Besides using it for toast, I've made cookies, frozen dinners, mini pizzas, and a whole slew of things I would normally use the oven for, but in small batches... not having to turn on my oven and preheat for 20 minutes to cook a small portion of something is not only a time saver but an electricity saver as well.Cleaning the inside of the glass can be a challenge if you have large hands... fortunately for me I have small enough hands that I can get under it with a cleaning cloth and wipe off any grunge.Another thing I LOVE is that the crumb tray is full-size... it covers the entire bottom of the oven and is easily removable from underneath the bottom rack. No having to pop open crumb trays (like my old oven and toaster) amid a shower of toast crumbs. This is really easy to clean.I do wish the provided tray was large enough to fit into the rack slots... why HB only made it wide enough to sit on top of the rack is a bit of a mystery.All in all, for $49, this is easily one of the best things I've purchased for the house in a long time and would gladly buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what we wanted!
reviews.reviewText: We have been needing to replace our 12-yr old Black & Decker toaster oven after burning my fingers way too many times on the glass door from the small ergo gap to grip the handle. After doing product comparison research for a week and reading many user reviews, this product stood out best for its overall size, features, and great price, without having to cave to the ever-popular but overpriced and oversized air fryer option. We have been using this oven for more than a month now.The overall size of this product is slightly larger than our replacement toaster oven, which is OK, given all the wonderful improvements. It is the perfect size for our small-ish counter space, which shares a Cutco knife block. We love the clear, readable, contrasting markings on the stainless panel and the dials are very easy to rotate (compared to B&D) with the perfect amount of resistance, and each dial also has curved ergo recesses on them (nice touch).The roll-up "EasyReach" door has a MUCH safer and larger ergo gap handle and the rolling door is SO handy and space-saving. The angled-back door and front panel surface provide us much easier access to reach the toasted or baked items on the rack without burning hands or having to slide the rack out at all as we did with the old one, which would often angle down or fall down completely and spill the items (BIG turn-off!). The roll-up door also prevents any food debris from falling onto the glass door as a regular flip-down door often does, which is hard to clean and often leaves brown baked stains on the glass.The oven fits an 11-in pizza perfectly thanks to the recessed bump-out shape on the back panel and also saves a ton of electricity to not have to preheat a large oven for such a small pizza. The convection setting also bakes a frozen pizza crust to a perfect crispness! The suggested settings for toasting bread slices are also spot-on for how I like mine golden brown.You will not go wrong in choosing this product if you have basic toaster oven needs and only a small space to do it in. VERY, VERY HAPPY! Thanks, Hamilton Beach.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good product , but complicated to clean
reviews.reviewText: Good product, handy for a small family consumption.utensil quality must improve, and hard to clean the glass surface.

It’s a good product. Working well so far. Takes more time then mentioned in use book but overall functioning is satisfactory. Particularly air fry mode works well on chicken and vegetables. Most importantly it looks good.
It was affordable and worth it airfryer cooks good,baking was so good

It is a worst quality product with their worst quality of service. It stopped working within 3 months of purchase. I contacted Hamilton Beach and they arranged a pick-up service from my home. It returned from service just a couple of days ago. When I opened it I was more disappointed. It was not opening at all. There was huge panel gap at side of the function buttons. Dents were here and there. It was so hopeless.Never buy this product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Looks like a good beginning with a great product
reviews.reviewText: Our Prestige oven was quite good but a month ago it died. The element needs replacement I think. I used it as a dehydrator because it can hold temp at 60, but I guess it wasn’t designed for that work.We need a replacement if the Prestige can’t be repaired… we will carry it to the service center anyway.I was dilly dallying over this particular Hamilton Beach oven for the last month. It looked good in theory and reviews, but what if ?Would I get service ? Would it be what we actually want ?I honestly don’t know because we got it this morning.I am sharing pictures of the item and contents.The packaging was good and everything arrived in good condition.The accessories were again carefully double packed. Someone has paid serious attention to the packaging system.This also leads me to believe the ownership experience will be equally good.Shall update after using.Sharing pictures also of the older oven for a size perspective. Also the front and side photos of the oven racks.HB in blue is the rack on the Hamilton Beach.The build quality of the oven and the accessories look and feel good too. No regrets there
